All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractTool
This abstract class AbstractTool extends Item and implements ToolInterface.
AbstractTool.ToolStatus
Enum for tool status, can be BROKEN, NORMAL, GOOD or EXCELLENT.
ActionArguments<T1,T2,T3>
Class that is used to pass arguments to the actions
ActionsManager
Class that manages all the actions that can be performed by the player
ActionsManager.Action
Enum that contains all the possible actions
ActionsManager.DualItemValidator
Interface that validates an item and a land used to validate actions that require both an item and a land
ActionsManager.ItemTypeValidator
Functional Interface that validates an item
ActionsManager.LandAbstractValidator
Functional Interface that validates a land
AnimalAbstract
This abstract class represents an Animal in the game.
AnimalChunk
 
AnimalFactory
A factory class for creating various types of animals.
AnimalInterface
This interface represents the basic behaviors of an animal in the model.
AnimalLand

Calendar
Represents a Calendar with seasons and weather conditions.
Calendar.Seasons
Enum representing the seasons of the year.
Calendar.Weather
Enum representing the weather conditions.
CalendarInt
Interface representing a calendar with various seasons and weather conditions.
Chunk
Small part of a land that contains one element
ConcreteAnimal
This class represents a concrete implementation of an Animal in the system.
Constants
Class that contains all the constants of the game
Controller
Controller class of the MVC pattern, manages the interaction between the view and the model

This class represents the IronFactory, a concrete implementation of the ToolFactory interface.

The project consists in the implementation of a farm simulator.

Model class of the MVC pattern, contains all the data of the game

Represents a common interface for all people.

Represents an abstract class for a person.

Enum representing the role of the person.

General class of places

Class that represents the actions of a place

Enum that contains the places an actor can be in

Class that represents a basic plant
Plant.PlantLife
Enum that contains the life stage of the plant

Piece of land that contains a plant

PlantInterface
 
PlantLand
Land that contains chunks of land with plants
PlayerActions<T extends Person>
Class that contains all the actions that a player can perform
Products
This class extends the Item class and represents different types of products.
RolePanelView
 
ToolFactory
ToolFactory is an interface representing the Abstract Factory pattern for creating different types of tool items.
ToolInterface
The interface ToolInterface represents a tool in the game and provides methods related to a tool, such as using the tool, getting the tool status, and getting the material of the tool.
View
View class of the MVC pattern, contains all the GUI elements
WoodFactory
The WoodFactory class implements the ToolFactory interface and provides a concrete implementation for creating wood tool items.
WoodFertilizer
This class represents the WoodFertilizer tool, which is a specific type of Tool within the system.
WoodHoe
This class represents the WoodHoe tool, which is a specific type of Tool within the system.

This class represents the WoodScissors tool, which is a specific type of Tool within the system.

This class represents the WoodSickle tool, which is a specific type of Tool within the system.
